type.name: Message Queue Request
type.description: Holds information about a remote procedure call made to a message queue such that its response can be handled through the IRemoteResponseHandler interface. (Internal)

stringField.name: Key
stringField.description: The identifier of the queue/exchange that was addressed.

stringField.name: Token
stringField.description: The identifier of the individual call that was made to be matched up against the response.

stringField.name: Handler type
stringField.description: The implementation of IRemoteResponseHandler that will be instantiated to process the result.

stringField.name: Message body
stringField.description: The contents of the message that were passed as part of the request.

stringField.name: Message body type
stringField.description: The type that the message body contents should conform to.

stringField.name: Message result type
stringField.description: The type that the response message contents should conform to.
